alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Ellis; Greer; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:33PM CDT until July 07 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 731 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Follett to 3 miles northeast of Briscoe to 9 miles southeast of Mclean, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...West Texas Mesonet. At 722 PM a 66 mph wind gust was reported east of Miami. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Sayre, Shattuck, Cheyenne, Arnett, Erick, Gage, Fargo, Reydon, Sweetwater, Strong City, Texola, Delhi, Crawford, Roll, Durham, Catesby, Berlin, and Dempsey. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
